q: What's the difference between Apollo and ZoomInfo for B2B data?
a: Apollo offers better value with 275M+ contacts at $49/user/month, while ZoomInfo provides deeper mobile number coverage but costs $15,000+/year minimum. Apollo is ideal for startups and SMBs needing cost-effective prospecting. ZoomInfo suits enterprise teams requiring premium mobile data and advanced intent signals.
